Package org.elkoserver.server.context.mods

A package of generally useful mods and related objects.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Cartesian Mod to provide an item with 2D (rectangular) geometry.
Census Mod to enable tracking a context's population.
Chat Mod to enable users in a context to chat with each other.
Dictionary Mod to associate a server-moderated hashtable with its object.
Image Mod to associate an image with an object.
Invisible Marker mod to indicate that an item should be hidden from clients.
Note Mod to hold a free-floating chunk of text.
NoteMaker Mod to enable creation of notes.
PrivateChat Mod to enable users in a context to chat privately with each other.
StyleDesc Representation of style information for something containing text.
StyleOptions Representation of permissible text style information in a context that can contain text.
TalkOptions Mod to hold a context's permissible chat text display style options.
TalkPrefs Mod to hold a user's current chat text display style settings.
 

Package org.elkoserver.server.context.mods Description

A package of generally useful mods and related objects.
